examples: She was clutching the sheet around her naked body.
Ella estaba agarrando la sábana alrededor de su cuerpo desnudo.
Her blonde hair fell over her naked shoulders.
Su cabello rubio caía sobre sus hombros desnudos.
He was naked from the waist up.
Estaba desnudo de cintura para arriba.
They often wandered around the house stark naked (= completely naked).
A menudo vagaban por la casa completamente desnudos (= completamente desnudos).
